name: Plague of Locusts
description:
For the Godot Wild Jam 18. 

Theme was Plague. 

Wildcards used where:

80s baby! - Recreate the visual style of the 80s

Take a Chance on Me - Create a system of chance in your game

I Wish it Would Rain -  Implement weather effects of some kind in your game.

All art, code, music, and sound by John Gentzel

Font from Google Web Fonts "Press Start 2p"
